data.name: Global Azure 2020 - Washington DC
data.description:
The Global Azure event is a free one-day mini-conference, taking place on April 23-25 2020 in venues across the world, driven by Microsoft Azure experts and community enthusiasts.
The Washington DC edition will take place on April 25th in the Arlington Tech eXchange (ATX)

relatedRecords.name: Running Remote Conference
relatedRecords.description: 2-day conference focused on managing remote teams. Learn from experts how to start and scale an office-less business. 20-21 April, Austin, TX. Get your Pass!

relatedRecords.name: Mid-Atlantic Developer Conference
relatedRecords.description: Mid-Atlantic Developer Conference is a polyglot event, designed to bring together programmers from the region, regardless of their choice of platform, for two full days of learning from each other and building a stronger regional community.

relatedRecords.name: Agile Games New England 2020 Conference
relatedRecords.description: We are excited to announce that Agile Games 2020 will be held June 1-3 at Boston University. This move allows us to continue growing in a space that allows this unique gathering to flourish.

relatedRecords.name: Apache DC Roadshow 2020
relatedRecords.description: ApacheCon and Apache Roadshow Events are the place to come learn what Apache projects are doing, as well as a place for projects to come build stronger project communities, and forge bonds between projects.
